1.name: Suicide Squad
1.description: A secret government agency recruits some of the most dangerous incarcerated super-villains to form a defensive task force. Their first mission: save the world from the apocalypse.

2.name: The Magnificent Seven
2.description: Seven gunmen from a variety of backgrounds are brought together by a vengeful young widow to protect her town from the private army of a destructive industrialist.

3.name: X-Men: Apocalypse
3.description: In the 1980s the X-Men must defeat an ancient all-powerful mutant, En Sabah Nur, who intends to thrive through bringing destruction to the world.

4.name: Split
4.description: Three girls are kidnapped by a man with a diagnosed 23 distinct personalities. They must try to escape before the apparent emergence of a frightful new 24th.

5.name: Deadpool
5.description: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

6.name: Hacksaw Ridge
6.description: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people, and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

7.name: Me Before You
7.description: A girl in a small town forms an unlikely bond with a recently-paralyzed man she's taking care of.

8.name: Captain America: Civil War
8.description: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

9.name: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
9.description: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

10.name: Doctor Strange
10.description: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

11.name: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
11.description: The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.

12.name: War Dogs
12.description: Loosely based on the true story of two young men, David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli, who won a three hundred million dollar contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan.

13.name: Arrival
13.description: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.

14.name: La La Land
14.description: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

15.name: Moana
15.description: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.

16.name: Hell or High Water
16.description: A divorced father and his ex-con older brother resort to a desperate scheme in order to save their family's ranch in West Texas.

17.name: Warcraft
17.description: As an Orc horde invades the planet Azeroth using a magic portal, a few human heroes and dissenting Orcs must attempt to stop the true evil behind this war.

18.name: Ghostbusters
18.description: Following a ghost invasion of Manhattan, paranormal enthusiasts Erin Gilbert and Abby Yates, nuclear engineer Jillian Holtzmann, and subway worker Patty Tolan band together to stop the otherworldly threat.

19.name: Silence
19.description: In the 17th century, two Portuguese Jesuit priests travel to Japan in an attempt to locate their mentor, who is rumored to have committed apostasy, and to propagate Catholicism.

20.name: Moonlight
20.description: A young African-American man grapples with his identity and sexuality while experiencing the everyday struggles of childhood, adolescence, and burgeoning adulthood.

21.name: Rogue One
21.description: The daughter of an Imperial scientist joins the Rebel Alliance in a risky move to steal the Death Star plans.

22.name: Zootopia
22.description: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

23.name: Passengers
23.description: A spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet and transporting thousands of people has a malfunction in its sleep chambers. As a result, two passengers are awakened 90 years early.

24.name: Sausage Party
24.description: A sausage strives to discover the truth about his existence.

25.name: The Lost City of Z
25.description: A true-life drama, centering on British explorer Col. Percival Fawcett, who disappeared whilst searching for a mysterious city in the Amazon in the 1920s.

26.name: Gods of Egypt
26.description: Mortal hero Bek teams with the god Horus in an alliance against Set, the merciless god of darkness, who has usurped Egypt's throne, plunging the once peaceful and prosperous empire into chaos and conflict.

27.name: Captain Fantastic
27.description: In the forests of the Pacific Northwest, a father devoted to raising his six kids with a rigorous physical and intellectual education is forced to leave his paradise and enter the world, challenging his idea of what it means to be a parent.

28.name: Independence Day: Resurgence
28.description: Two decades after the first Independence Day invasion, Earth is faced with a new extra-Solar threat. But will mankind's new space defenses be enough?

29.name: Terrifier
29.description: A maniacal clown terrorizes three young women on Halloween night and everyone else who stands in his way.

30.name: Kimi no na wa.
30.description: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

31.name: Bad Moms
31.description: When three overworked and under-appreciated moms are pushed beyond their limits, they ditch their conventional responsibilities for a jolt of long overdue freedom, fun and comedic self-indulgence.

32.description: Five carnival workers are kidnapped and held hostage in an abandoned, hellish compound where they are forced to participate in a violent game, the goal of which is to survive twelve hours against a gang of sadistic clowns.

33.name: Nocturnal Animals
33.description: A wealthy art gallery owner is haunted by her ex-husband's novel, a violent thriller she interprets as a symbolic revenge tale.

34.name: Ah-ga-ssi
34.description: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

35.name: Dirty Grandpa
35.description: Right before his wedding, an uptight guy is tricked into driving his grandfather, a lecherous former Army Lieutenant Colonel, to Florida for Spring Break.

36.name: Contratiempo
36.description: While the clock is ticking, with the aid of a witness preparation expert, a successful entrepreneur accused of murder has less than three hours to come up with an impregnable defence.

37.name: Star Trek Beyond
37.description: The crew of the USS Enterprise explores the furthest reaches of uncharted space, where they encounter a new ruthless enemy, who puts them, and everything the Federation stands for, to the test.

38.name: Criminal
38.description: In a last-ditch effort to stop a diabolical plot, a dead CIA operative's memories, secrets, and skills are implanted into a death-row inmate in hopes that he will complete the operative's mission.

39.name: Sing
39.description: In a city of humanoid animals, a hustling theater impresario's attempt to save his theater with a singing competition becomes grander than he anticipates even as its finalists find that their lives will never be the same.

40.name: Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children
40.description: When Jacob discovers clues to a mystery that stretches across time, he finds Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children. But the danger deepens after he gets to know the residents and learns about their special powers.

41.name: Hidden Figures
41.description: The story of a team of female African-American mathematicians who served a vital role in NASA during the early years of the U.S. space program.

42.name: Jason Bourne
42.description: The CIA's most dangerous former operative is drawn out of hiding to uncover more explosive truths about his past.

43.name: Don't Breathe
43.description: Hoping to walk away with a massive fortune, a trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who isn't as helpless as he seems.

44.name: The Neon Demon
44.description: An aspiring model, Jesse, is new to Los Angeles. However, her beauty and youth, which generate intense fascination and jealousy within the fashion industry, may prove themselves sinister.

45.name: The Conjuring 2
45.description: Ed and Lorraine Warren travel to North London to help a single mother raising 4 children alone in a house plagued by a supernatural spirit.

46.name: Allegiant
46.description: After the earth-shattering revelations of Insurgent, Tris must escape with Four beyond the wall that encircles Chicago, to finally discover the shocking truth of the world around them.

47.name: Trolls
47.description: After the Bergens invade Troll Village, Poppy, the happiest Troll ever born, and the curmudgeonly Branch set off on a journey to rescue her friends.

48.name: The Bad Batch
48.description: In a desert dystopia, a young woman is kidnapped by cannibals.

49.name: Lion
49.description: A five-year-old Indian boy gets lost on the streets of Calcutta, thousands of kilometers from home. He survives many challenges before being adopted by a couple in Australia. 25 years later, he sets out to find his lost family.

50.name: London Has Fallen
50.description: In London for the Prime Minister's funeral, Mike Banning is caught up in a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders.
